localTransport.details: Use the Mumbai local train for efficient travel, supplemented by taxis or local buses for specific destinations. Consider using ride-sharing apps.

activities.title: Arrive in Mumbai & Check-in
activities.description: Arrive at Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Terminus (CST) and check into Hotel Marine Plaza. Freshen up and get ready to explore.
activities.location: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Terminus (CST) to Hotel Marine Plaza

activities.title: Gateway of India & Taj Mahal Palace Hotel
activities.description: Visit the iconic Gateway of India and admire the architectural grandeur of the Taj Mahal Palace Hotel. Take a stroll around the area.

activities.title: Dinner at Leopold Cafe
activities.description: Enjoy a delicious meal at Leopold Cafe, a historic restaurant in Colaba known for its lively atmosphere and diverse menu.

sustainableAlternative.title: Dinner at Local Family Restaurant
sustainableAlternative.description: Dine at a family-owned restaurant in Colaba that serves traditional Maharashtrian cuisine using locally sourced ingredients.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Supports local businesses and reduces carbon footprint associated with food transportation.

activities.title: Marine Drive Walk
activities.description: Take a leisurely walk along Marine Drive, also known as the Queen's Necklace, and enjoy the sea breeze and city lights.

activities.title: Visit Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Museum
activities.description: Explore the Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Museum to learn about Indian history and culture. Admire the diverse collection of artifacts and exhibits.

activities.title: Lunch at Britannia & Co.
activities.description: Enjoy a Parsi meal at Britannia & Co., a legendary restaurant known for its Berry Pulao and other traditional Parsi dishes.

sustainableAlternative.title: Pack a Picnic Lunch
sustainableAlternative.description: Prepare a picnic lunch with locally sourced and sustainable ingredients and enjoy it in a park or garden.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Reduces food waste from restaurants and supports local farmers and producers.

activities.title: Dhobi Ghat
activities.description: Visit Dhobi Ghat, an open-air laundry where clothes are washed by hand in a traditional manner. Witness the unique and fascinating process.

activities.title: Departure from Mumbai
activities.description: Depart from Mumbai and return to Thane.
